title: Advanced Energy Industries Touts Data Center Growth, Sees 2026 Semi Upswing at Needham Conference
text: Advanced Energy Industries (NASDAQ: AEIS) management used a presentation at the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference to outline the company's end-market mix, expectations for its data center business, and the drivers it sees for improvement in both semiconductor equipment demand and profitability over time. title: Advanced Energy Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEIS) Receives Average Rating of “Moderate Buy” from Brokerages
text: Shares of Advanced Energy Industries, Inc. title: Cavalry Capital Corp. Announces Conditional TSXV Acceptance and Filing of Filing Statement for Qualifying Transaction
text: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - December 15, 2025) - Cavalry Capital Corp. (TSXV: CVY.P) ("Cavalry" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has received conditional acceptance of the TSX Venture Exchange (the "TSXV") to close its business combination with Advanced Energy Fuels, Inc. ("Advanced Energy"), as previously announced by Cavalry on May 16, 2025 and July 29, 2025 (the "Transaction"). The Transaction will constitute the "Qualifying Transaction" of Cavalry, as such a term is defined in Policy 2.4 - Capital Pool Companies of the TSXV.
